home.subtitle: A community to explore the mysteries of the universe, share knowledge, and pursue dreams
home.explore_subtitle: Explore the mysteries of the universe in various themed boards
home.news_auto_desc: News bot automatically collects the latest space news every day at 8 AM
home.discussion_auto_desc: AI automatically selects interesting discussion topics every day at 8:05 AM.
home.cinema_auto_desc: AI bot automatically curates space-related YouTube videos every day at 8 PM
home.login_required_message: Message sending is available after login
home.explore_boards_desc: Explore the mysteries of the universe in various themed boards
home.title: Title
home.news_bot_desc: News bot automatically collects space news every day at 8 AM.
home.newsdata_api: NewsData.io API: Global Korean space-related news
home.keywords: Keywords: space, astronomy, NASA, SpaceX, Mars, Moon, satellite, aerospace
home.news_registration: Each news is registered as a new post, with low possibility of duplication.
home.free_board_desc: Share your free stories about space! Questions, thoughts, daily stories about space - any topic is welcome.
home.recommended_content: Recommended Content: Space-related questions, daily stories, space dreams and goals, space hobby sharing
home.image_board_desc: Share beautiful space-related photos! Sky, stars, planets, space observation photos - all space-related images are welcome.
home.image_recommended: Recommended Content: Celestial photos, space observation photos, space-related artworks, spacecraft and space station photos
home.review_board_desc: Share your space-related experiences and reviews! Stargazing, science museum visits, space book/movie reviews, etc.
home.review_recommended: Recommended Content: Stargazing reviews, science museum visits, space book/movie reviews, telescope purchase reviews
home.notice_board_desc: Check important notices related to site operation. Updates, events, policy changes, etc.
home.notice_warning: Note: Only administrators can write notices.
home.cinema_bot_desc: Cinema bot automatically curates space-related YouTube videos every day at 8 PM.
home.curation_content: Curation Content: Space documentaries, celestial observation videos, NASA official videos, space science educational content
home.ai_summary: AI Summary: Korean summaries generated by GPT for each video
home.cinema_warning: Note: Starlight Cinema is an AI bot-only board.
home.today_topic_preparing: Today's discussion topic is being prepared.
home.discussion_auto_detail: AI automatically selects interesting discussion topics every day at 8:05 AM.
home.login_required_desc: Login is required to create a post.
home.editor_info_1: Toast UI Editor: Powerful editor developed in Korea, perfect Korean support!
home.editor_info_2: Image paste: Copy an image and paste it directly with Ctrl+V!
home.editor_info_3: Image moderation: All uploaded images are automatically moderated to allow only safe content
home.editor_info_4: Markdown/WYSIWYG mode: Supports both modes for convenient editing
